name: Sonography Machine
description: A high-performance sonography machine used for diagnostic imaging. Features include high resolution and real-time imaging for various applications.

name: CR Machines
description: Computed Radiography (CR) systems for digital X-ray imaging, providing high-quality diagnostic images with quick processing times.

name: Hospital Equipment
description: Comprehensive range of hospital equipment, including diagnostic imaging, monitoring, and therapeutic devices for healthcare facilities.

name: X-Ray Machine
description: X-ray machine for a wide variety of diagnostic imaging needs, offering high-quality imaging with quick and efficient operation.

name: C Arm Machine
description: A versatile imaging system used in surgical and diagnostic applications, providing real-time X-ray images for guidance during procedures.

name: Refurbished CT Scanner
description: A refurbished CT scanner offering high-resolution imaging for detailed cross-sectional views of the body, suitable for a variety of diagnostic needs.

name: Point Of Care Ultrasound
description: Portable ultrasound system designed for use at the point of care, enabling fast and accurate diagnostics in emergency or critical settings.
